fullplot: When Diancie a Pokèmon said to create diamond travels to find Xerneas to help her make a heart diamond to save her home, Ash, Serena, Clemont and Bonnie help her to be safe on the way from thieves.

title: Pokèmon the Movie: Diancie and the Cocoon of Destruction
